page.title: 07HOUSING 1
page.content: The area cotains mainly owner-occupied houses,with somme divide into flats. Most was built in the 1930s, though some is older(1900s). Most people living here work in London and travel there by undergound {railway} or by { {bus}. The people in the area are from several {ethnic}groups, mainly from Asia and Europe, with a small number of West Indians. There is little unemployment in the area. Most people work in service industries in London and Haringey. There are few manufacturing jobs. Most people said that the local people "keep themselves to themselves". There is a wide social mix and though families tend to be close, this does not extend to the community as a whole.
